Package ca.ualberta.cmput301f13t13.storyhoard.gui

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AdapterChapters
    Class which handles taking the Chapter object and adapting it to a displayable view type.
    AdapterChoices
    Class which handles taking the Choice object and adapting it to a displayable view type.
    AdapterStories
    Class which handles adapting the Story object to a displayable view type.
    DeleteImageDialog  
    EditChapterActivity
    Add Chapter Activity Purpose: - To add a chapter to an existing story.
    EditChoiceActivity
    Activity class for adding and editing a choice.
    EditStoryActivity
    Activity for editing the story details (title, author, description, and cover image).
    LifecycleData
    This is a singleton class for the gui, designed to hold state values between activities.
    MediaActivity
    This activity handles all the media getting and setting code.
    SearchActivity
    Search Activity Allows user to enter keywords of the title of a published, downloaded or personal story they wish to find and read.
    SearchResultsActivity
    Search Results activity Displays a list of search results with the parameters given by the user This is called after the search activity is finished.
    ViewBrowseChapters
    When a specific story exists, the activity gets the chapters associated with the story and displays them for the user.
    ViewBrowseStories
    Class which displays all stories in a grid.
    ViewChapter
    This activity displays a specified chapter, based on what is in the lifecycle data.
    ViewStory
    Handles viewing the story details.
